name: Merge Gnomes - Level Up
description:
First came Gnomeo and Juliet…

Then came Sherlock Gnome…

And now there’s Merge Gnome…

Based on the popular gnome theme, comes a beautiful game with addictive game mechanics.

Nomatter Whatson, Frankie Fabulous, Sherlock and many others are here to dig some golden coins for you. Who are they? Set them free from the barrels and find out.

Drag identical gnomes and merge them to unlock new ones - basketballer, wolverine and others.

Create your own squad of unbelievable gnomes who are ready to mine some gold. Get huge rewards and gifts. The more you earn the more “tiny heroes” you can buy.

FEATURES
- Discover over 30 unique gnomes: From guitarist to policeman
- Drag and match identical gnomes
- Dig deeper for more gold
- Tap to unlock fantastic chests to get some cool gifts
- Get idle coins, even when you are offline
- Manage your squad of different species

Great team! A lot of Gold! This is what Merge Gnomes is about!!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
